name: Kento Ito
overview: Kento Ito :Born in 1986. Graduate of Muroran Institute of Technology. Began a 6 year trip in 2009 with the intention of working on environmental issues. Traveled around the world twice, visited 40 countries, experienced the state of the world and indigenous cultures, and keenly felt the importance of culture for human issues such as environmental problems. Also saw how the world views Japan and met Japanese people working around the world. Felt Japan's possibilities and returned to his home country. While giving lectures all around Japan, he conducts various activities aiming for a Japan that is globally active through traditional culture and international exchange.
